Name: Rigid Body
Desc: Can only take 1 DMG each time. After a ping by the player, loses the stack(s) of [Rigid Body] equal to the total value of the card pinged.

Name: Yellow Thirst
Desc: When the player performs a <color=#FAD364FF>Yellow Orb</color> 3-Ping, the enemy gains [Rigid Body] x10.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D><size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Rigid Body]: Can only take 1 DMG each time. After a ping by the player, loses the stack(s) of [Rigid Body] equal to the total value of the card pinged.</color></size>

Name: Red Thirst
Desc: When the player performs a <color=#CD2F30FF>Red Orb</color> 3-Ping, the enemy gains [Berserk] x1.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D><size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Berserk]: Can be stacked. Each stack increases the DMG dealt by 1.</color></size>

Name: Blue Thirst
Desc: When the player performs a <color=#59CCFFFF>Blue Orb</color> 3-Ping, summons 1 Self-Destruction Bug.

Name: Frail
Desc: Takes 50% more damage. Removes 1 stack after taking damage.

Name: Berserk
Desc: Can be stacked. Each stack increases the DMG dealt by 1.

Name: Fatigue
Desc: Deals 25% less damage. Removes 1 stack upon dealing damage.

Name: Countdown
Desc: Removes 1 stack upon action. At 0 stack, the enemy explodes and deals 10 DMG to the player.

Name: Bitter Journey I
Desc: For every 12 actions by the player, the enemy gains [Rigid Body] x20. The action count resets when the enemy takes 12 or more DMG from a single attack.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Rigid Body]: Can only 1 damage each time. After a ping by the player, loses the stack(s) of [Rigid Body] equal to the total value of the card pinged.</color></size>

Name: Bitter Journey II
Desc: For every 12 actions by the player, the enemy gains [Berserk] x1. The action count resets when the enemy takes 12 or more DMG from a single attack.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Berserk]: Can be stacked. Each stack increases the damage dealt by 1.</color></size>

Name: Bitter Journey III
Desc: For every 12 actions by the player, the enemy gains [Rigid Body] x20 and adds 2 [Punishment] Cards to the draw pile. The action count resets when the enemy takes 24 or more DMG from a single attack.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Punishment] Card: <Icon=IconHeart|24|24/> K Card. Grants 1 Action Point. When this card is drawn, the commandant takes 3 DMG. Removal upon use.</color></size>

Name: Bitter Journey IV
Desc: For every 12 actions by the player, the enemy gains [Berserk] x1 and adds 2 [Punishment] Cards to the draw pile. The action count resets when the enemy takes 24 or more DMG from a single attack.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Punishment] Card: <Icon=IconHeart|24|24/> K Card. Grants 1 Action Point. When this card is drawn, the commandant takes 3 DMG. Removal upon use.</color></size>

Name: Infect
Desc: Inflicts [Frail] x2 on the commandant upon death.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Frail]: Takes 50% more DMG. Removes 1 stack after taking DMG.</color></size>

Name: Infect
Desc: Inflicts [Frail] x2 on the commandant upon death.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Frail]: Takes 50% more DMG. Removes 1 stack after taking DMG.</color></size>

Name: Infect
Desc: Inflicts [Frail] x2 on the commandant upon death.<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Frail]: Takes 50% more DMG. Removes 1 stack after taking DMG.</color></size>

Name: Sage
Desc: When damage dealt to the commandant through a single attack is ï¼ž10, adds 1 [Punishment] Card to the draw pile. <size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>\n- [Punishment] Card: King of Hearts. Grants 1 Action Point. When this card is drawn, the commandant takes 3 DMG. Removal upon use.</color></size>

Name: More!
Desc: Gains 20 Armor, removes [Bitter Journey III], and gets [Bitter Journey IV] if Iron Maiden's HP is below 120 when the action starts.

Name: Security Check I
Desc: If the player has <color=#CD2F30FF>an Ace</color> in their hand when their action starts, summons 1 Terrapod.

Name: Security Check II
Desc: If the player has <color=#CD2F30FF>an Ace or a card valued 2</color> in their hand when their action starts, summons 1 Terrapod.

Name: Security Check III
Desc: If the player has <color=#CD2F30FF>a Red Orb Card</color> in their hand when their action starts, summons 1 Terrapod.

Name: Flight
Desc: Takes 50% less damage. Removes 1 stack upon taking damage. After losing the last stack of [Flight], the enemy will not be able to act for 1 turn.

Name: Crash Landing
Desc: Unable to act. Removal upon use. Gains [Flight] x2.
